Headline: Linden-bound Purple and Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bnd Purple and Dempster-Skokie-bnd Yellow Line  trains are running w/res delays following earlier heavy train congestion at Howard. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple and Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line  trains are running w/residual delays following earlier heavy train congestion at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to a mechanical problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Harlem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Harlem.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
